rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0002
rows.name:
The name's Rex. Nice to
be working with you.

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0003
rows.name:
Hey, you're not going to tell me
what you're looking for, are you?

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0004
rows.name:
You catch on quick, kid.
That's right, it's a secret.

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, yeah... but even if
you don't tell me, I'll
still do my job right.

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0007
rows.name:
That's how it should be. I'm counting
on your salvaging skills, kid.
